thread.title: Elishia Oliva

author: Elishia Oliva
title: Elishia Oliva
text: Fernando Reyes was very helpful today. I followed up with an online order delivery question. Fernando took the time to make sure that the delivery window was going to work for us and even shifted it one day for us as we were going out of town around the delivery date. He also went on to reassure me that if there were any concerns once we received the seats or questions about the seats we could contact him directly. Very pleasant, knowledgeable and quick to resolve my concerns. Purchasing my seating from this company was a great decision. Customer service is great!!
